long_description: The REI Packable Sun hat has a broad 4 in. brim to shade your neck and face from the hot sun. Natural fibers ventilate warm air outward to keep your head from getting too hot. Polyester elastic browband stretches for an easy fit, and it absorbs sweat to keep you cool and dry. Hat is crushable, so you can pack it up for a trip knowing that when you take it from your bag it will unfold fresh to shape. Faux leather chinstrap secures the REI Packable Sun hat when the winds pick up.
short_description: The REI Packable Sun hat has a broad 4 in. brim to shade your neck and face from the hot sun.
